pages.text: $(li)Nautilus are passive creatures that can be found underwater caves and ravines, except in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/cold_ocean)Cold Oceans$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/frozen_ocean)Frozen Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)When a $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/drowned)Drowned$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squid$(/l) or you are near one of these creatures or if they are hitted, they will perform a few dashes to escape.
Nautilis may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/nautilus_shell)Nautilus Shell$(/l) upon death.

$(li)They are immune to buble columns and are unaffected by their pull.$(br)$(li)You can capture these creatures with $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/water_bucket)Water Buckets$(/l). If you release one from this bucket, it will not despawn.
